thread.section_title: Royal Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location - staff could be a little more friendly.
thread.title_full: Good location - staff could be a little more friendly. - Review of Royal Garden Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Eaa68
title: Good location - staff could be a little more friendly.
text: Would definitely stay there again. Lovely room with great view. Central location in London with access to public transportation and taxis. A little pricey. Rooms are very clean. Highly recommend this hotel.
